an8.24:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
an8.24:4.2: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako pañcamattehi upāsakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an8.24:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an8.24:4.6: Kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, hatthaka, imaṃ mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhāsī”ti?
an8.24:4.7: “* Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā desitāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, tehāhaṃ imaṃ mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhāmi.
an8.24:4.16: Saṃvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogā.
an8.24:4.17: Daliddassa kho no tathā sotabbaṃ maññantī”ti.
an8.24:4.19: Yoni kho tyāyaṃ, hatthaka, mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgahetuṃ.
an8.24:4.20: Ye hi keci, hatthaka, atītamaddhānaṃ mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgahesuṃ, sabbe te imeheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgahesuṃ.
an8.24:4.21: Yepi hi keci, hatthaka, anāgatamaddhānaṃ mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhissanti, sabbe te imeheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhissanti.
an8.24:4.22: Yepi hi keci, hatthaka, etarahi mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhanti, sabbe te imeheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahatiṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantī”ti.
an8.24:5.1: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
an8.24:5.2: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkante hatthake āḷavake bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.24:5.3: “aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ dhāretha.
an8.24:5.13: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ dhārethā”ti.
